title: Human Physiology and Nutrition Fund
description: To provide unrestricted support for the Human Physiology and Nutrition Department at the discretion of the Chair in the Helen and Arthur E. Johnson Beth-El College of Nursing and Health Sciences at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs
marketingContent: To provide unrestricted support for the Human Physiology and Nutrition Department at the discretion of the Chair in the Helen and Arthur E. Johnson Beth-El College of Nursing and Health Sciences at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs.
